articles.title: Trainee doctor accused of secretly recording video of hundreds of female colleagues in hospital restrooms - CBS News
articles.description: A trainee surgeon stands accused in Australia of secretly recording videos of hundreds of female colleagues in hospital restrooms.
articles.content: Melbourne, Australia — A trainee surgeon was released from custody on bail Friday after he was accused of secretly video recording hundreds of medical colleagues in the restrooms of Australian hospit… [+2754 chars]
